column4: cafuego: there's nothing in worthawholebean's post that indicates illegal activity.
please don't encourage it
dude, it's just out of courtesy and respect for others here that we ask users not to use profanity
I know. I'm just arguing that the common abbreviation for the code of conduct is perfectly polite.
okay...
wow, it's called "Behaviour" here ;)  Very thoroughly britishified.
yeah, and this Xchat-gnome's color preferences tab spells it "colour", even here :(
that's all right, now, isn't it, mate? ;)
it has an extra letter ;)
mate is another one of those words that has a _completely_ different meaning here
oh, a source of misunderstanding, like "keep your pecker up"? (pecker = nose)
glad you clarified that meaning in parentheses ;)
I better shut up now ;)
when I was young, and hadn't read the lyrics, I thought Pink Floyd sang "no docks of hazzum in the claws room"
may I quote you on that?
be my guest :)
in what form of media?  maybe I should have denied your request ;)
I was thinking about a simultaneous Blimp ad over San Francisco, CA and London, England ;)
have you got an idea for V4Vendetta?
let me scroll back...
running sudo qtparted, can't resize sda1, plenty of space...
if the device name is ath0, it must be atheros/madwifi.
as I told him
